comments.raw_text:
Safari has a debug menu that can be enabled via a pref:
http://rakaz.nl/2007/06/enabling-the-debug-menu-on-safari-for-windows.html

We have a lot of feature for debugging, some that we even ship. It would be handy to have such a menu for developers to increase the visibility of debugging features.
comments.creator: b56girard@gmail.com
comments.author: b56girard@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
For people looking at this bug I have an extension that adds some options that is easy to extend:
https://github.com/bgirard/PlatformDebug
comments.creator: b56girard@gmail.com
